website_summaries.verdict: Industrious little ones who already have the hang of sweeping, mopping, dusting or vacuuming will enjoy a change of pace with their very own laundry set – and this is one of the best around.
pros: Features washer/dryer temperature dials and a spinning front window
Comes with everything necessary for laundry day, including miniature clothing, an iron, clothes basket and more
Wooden construction stands up well to heavy use
Ironing action helps little ones improve hand-eye coordination
cons: however, the size doesn’t seem to slow down little hands

customer_reviews.title: Better Than You Think!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter begged and begged for this Washer/Dryer set. It looked too small and low functioning to both of us and we kept telling her we would not purchase it. WOW, were we wrong! We finally bought it for her and she loves it. The combination of her imagination and the correct play toy has turned into hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: the front of the washer can be spun like the clothes are spinning in the washer/dryer
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy! The dials on the washing machine and on the iron turn, the front of the washer can be spun like the clothes are spinning in the washer/dryer. A good size for "washing" doll clothes. The shirt and pants that are included are made of felt, and do not open to fit on any doll. They have some sort of stiff material inside the 2 felt layers, so they can be "ironed", folded, and ironed flat again. The laundry soap is wood, but the box of fabric softener sheets is cardboard, so I'm not sure how long that will hold up. It does include 3 pretend softener sheets, though! Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is smaller than I expected but it is really ...
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I expected but it is really cute. My daughter likes to help me put clothes in the washer and dryer and then take them out when they are done. I wish the washer and dryer were separate; it is a combination and you turn the dial to the washer side or the dryer side. My daughter doesn't seem to mind at her age.
customer_reviews.author: slt165

customer_reviews.title: This set is great. I love that the clothes can be wrinkled ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. I love that the clothes can be wrinkled and then 'ironed'. I also like that it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Faulkenbury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons (18 months and 3 years old) enjoy pretending with the dryer and ironing their clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Godic

customer_reviews.title: I love Melissa & Doug products and this one is good ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa & Doug products and this one is good quality as usual. The only reason I give it 3 stars is because of its size. It's really very small. If it were a little bigger it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great little washer
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this product. It was the right size for our home, but it is small. It sits on a small bench in our home and could easily sit on a table as well. My daughter and son both love the little iron accessory that comes along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: It really is the best but I feel if it were a bit bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it can’t get 5 stars is because the size of the washer and dryer. It really is the best but I feel if it were a bit bigger my nephew would have kept interest in it. It really is great I love the wood toys! Love the gadgets it comes with it’s just super adorable just super small too!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Washer/Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this as one of her Christmas gifts! Once she opened it, she didn't want to play with anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a Short Period of Time
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son enjoys pretending with this set. As always, Melissa & Doug have quality products that won't wear down over time.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Frizz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Ordered for my step daughter’s bday (she’s been asking for a “baby doll washer and drier” forever). It’s not too big, but not too small. Made of wood I think and I can’t wait to give it to her!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Collins

customer_reviews.title: if I could rate 10 stars I would do it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little princess loves this toy !!! For more than 6 months, every day of use, looks like new. Excellent quality !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Cojuhari

customer_reviews.title: and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for a washing machine for her 5th birthday. Very cute, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie b

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, imaginative, twin 21/2 yr olds love it, creative play activity, worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A E Weynand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I also bought the mop and dustpan with dust pan is missing
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: this thing is 1/8th the size of my grandson's kitchen set. It is smaller than his table and chair set. I wished I had checked the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but small
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but smaller than expected. Comes with accessories, which my 2 year old loves
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old great nephew because he loves to "help" with laundry. He loved it, but so did his 4 year old big brother. It truly was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: readeybook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Preschool
customer_reviews.text: This toy, like most other Melissa and Doug toys, is great. Sturdy enough to withstand the strength of mighty preschoolers. The students all have a blast playing with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson is obsessed with doing laundry and loved receiving this for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: Rena Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but the description is accurate (I just didn't read it) and that ended up being a blessing because we don't have a ton of room. My daughter loves this. It think it is good quality. She has so much fun with it. The washer/dryer is a good size for doll clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little toy set for kids. I am a therapist and I use it with my kiddos and they love it! There are actual pretens dryer sheets in the box! Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playing a game of "house" in high style
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, solid in build, engagingly designed and a nice size for tight spaces, this is a another good buy for fans of Melissa & Doug products. Highly recommended for those in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo D. Hackenbush

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loves it. It is built very well. Should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It annoyed my daughter so much
customer_reviews.text: Okay toy. Really hard for my 4 year old to close the door. It annoyed my daughter so much. It should be easier to close and open for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Everardo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Small,  but fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to the let's play house series. My kids have enjoyed some of the other play house toys and absolutely enjoy this one as well. I do find the set to be on the small side. My 5 year old has trouble opening and closing the washer, so kids even younger might get pretty frustrated with that. The detail on the items is great. I love how you can wrinkle the clothes and then iron them, that's awesome. Both my 2 year old and 5 year old have enjoyed playing with this, and I do see it getting a lot of use at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Wash, Dry & Iron Play Set
product_meta.description:
Laundry day has never been so much fun! Wash, dry, and iron with this wooden 8-piece set. Front-loading washer/dryer features a spin-able window, control knob for choosing wash or dry settings, and an attached ironing board. Laundry basket, detergent and dyer sheets store conveniently on the shelves. Press out wrinkles from the shirt and pants with the sturdy iron with settings knob, and then store the clean, ironed clothes in the clothes basket! Kids can even use the handy checklist to keep track of laundry day chores! Imaginative play encourages hand-eye coordination and self-esteem.

BRAND STORY
By Melissa & Doug

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: Pretend-play laundry set with wooden washer/dryer and iron
Includes laundry checklist, clothes basket, iron, clothing, detergent, and dryer sheets
Front dryer window spins and knobs turn to set temperature controls
